MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA3 postcode area of Warrington affecting properties in Gosling Road, Eaves Brow Road, Wadeson Way and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 8:32am. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. Once they arrive or when we receive any update regarding the cause we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:56am on 26th January 2021
